thread.title: Israeli police question Netanyahu in corruption case

title: Israeli police question Netanyahu in corruption case
text:
Israeli police question Netanyahu in corruption case   02:18 
Israeli police questioned Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Friday for the first time in a corruption case that involves the country's largest telecommunications company, Israel Radio said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
